This programleverages tools and modeling to ensure technology policies and standards address critical risks and adequately address regulatory expectations throughout the Firm.The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a leading global financial services firm providing investment banking, securities and investment management services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments and high-net-worth individuals. The Goldman Sachs Technology Risk organization is a key part of the Goldman Sachs technology organization, and encompasses Information Security, Risk Advisory, Measurement and Governance functions. The measurement and analytics team within Technology Risk is tasked with building and managing technology solutions that help the Firm protect its information assets, while measuring and managing risk. Establishing a sound set of security solutions is a key mission for the measurement and analytics team; and is central to the success of the Technology Risk organization. We are looking for a highly motivated and technically savvy data modeling engineer for our Technology Risk measurement and analytics team. This position will be based in New York, NY.
